articles.title: Black tie or bust: glamour returns at the Oscars - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Carey Mulligan came as an Oscar, red and white were major colour trends and there was a lot of navel gazing - and navels.
articles.content:
Red on the red carpet
As far as colour trends went, Viola Davis Alexander McQueen gown, in Dulux Vivid White, was a standout. White suffragette suits were also an early key look (Diane Warren, Tiara… [+3401 chars]
